    1: <?php
    2: namespace Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Env\Model\Http;
    3:
    4: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Env AS Env;
    5: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\File AS File;
    6:
    7: include_once(dirname(__FILE__).'/auth.php');
    8: include_once(dirname(__FILE__).'/parse.php');
    9: include_once(dirname(__FILE__).'/request.php');
    10:
    11: /**
    12: * HTTP attributes
    13: * @return Object $attributes
    14: */
    15: function Attributes()
    16: {
    17: $host = Host();
    18: $protocol = ($host == Env\cli_domain())
    19: ? Env\cli_protocol() : Protocol();
    20:
    21: $uri = Uri();
    22: $hash = Parse\Hash($uri);
    23: $query = QueryString();
    24: $offset = Parse\Offset($uri);
    25: $query_delim = (strpos($uri, '?')) ? '/?' : '';
    26: $route = Parse\Route($uri);
    27: $route = (strpos($route, Env\MODIFIER_DELIMITER))
    28: ? explode(Env\MODIFIER_DELIMITER, $route)[0]
    29: : $route;
    30:
    31: $obj = Def();
    32:
    33: $obj->base = $protocol . $host . $offset;
    34: $obj->data = Data();
    35: $obj->elements = Parse\Elements($uri);
    36: $obj->full = $protocol
    37: . $host
    38: . $offset
    39: . $query_delim
    40: . $query
    41: . $hash;
    42: $obj->hash = $hash;
    43: $obj->host = $host;
    44: $obj->modifier = Parse\Modifier($uri);
    45: $obj->offset = $offset;
    46: $obj->protocol = $protocol;
    47: $obj->protocol_host = $protocol . $host;
    48: $obj->query = $query;
    49: $obj->query_delim = $query_delim;
    50: $obj->route = $route;
    51: $obj->relative = $uri;
    52: $obj->resource = Parse\Resource($uri);
    53: $obj->uri = $obj->relative;
    54: $obj->url = $obj->full;
    55:
    56: return $obj;
    57: }
    58:
    59: /**
    60: * Request data object
    61: * @return Object $req
    62: */
    63: function Data () {
    64: return (object) [
    65: 'cookie' => $_COOKIE,
    66: 'get' => $_GET,
    67: 'post' => Post()
    68: ];
    69: }
    70:
    71: /**
    72: * HTTP request environment variables object
    73: * @return Object $def Object [ 'base', 'data', 'elements', 'full', 'hash', 'host', 'method', 'modifier', 'offset', 'protocol', 'query', 'query_delim', 'relative', 'resource', 'route', 'uri', 'url' ]
    74: */
    75: function Def() {
    76: return (object) [
    77: 'base' => false,
    78: 'data' => false,
    79: 'elements' => false,
    80: 'full' => false,
    81: 'hash' => false,
    82: 'host' => false,
    83: 'method' => Method(),
    84: 'modifier' => false,
    85: 'offset' => false,
    86: 'protocol' => false,
    87: 'protocol_host' => false,
    88: 'query' => false,
    89: 'query_delim' => false,
    90: 'relative' => false,
    91: 'resource' => false,
    92: 'route' => false,
    93: 'uri' => false,
    94: 'url' => false
    95: ];
    96: }
    97:
    98: /** Get headers by URL
    99: * @param String $url
    100: * @return Array $headers
    101: */
    102: function Headers(String $url, String $method='GET', Array $arr=[]) {
    103: $arr = [];
    104:
    105: $context = stream_context_create();
    106: if ($method !== 'GET') {
    107: $data = http_build_query($arr);
    108: $context = stream_context_create(
    109: [
    110: 'http' => [
    111: 'method' => $method,
    112: 'header'=> "Content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded\r\n" . "Content-Length: " . strlen($data) . "\r\n",
    113: 'content' => $data
    114: ]
    115: ]
    116: );
    117: }
    118:
    119: $headers = get_headers($url, false, $context);
    120: foreach ($headers AS $header) {
    121: $p = explode(': ', $header);
    122: $key = (isset($p[1]))
    123: ? $p[0]
    124: : 'status';
    125: $value = (isset($p[1]))
    126: ? $p[1]
    127: : $p[0];
    128:
    129: if ($key === 'status') {
    130: $p = explode(' ', $value);
    131: $protocol = $p[0];
    132: array_shift($p);
    133: $code = $p[0];
    134: array_shift($p);
    135: $message = implode(' ', $p);
    136: $arr['status-protocol'] = $protocol;
    137: $arr['status-code'] = (int) $code;
    138: $arr['status-message'] = $message;
    139: }
    140: $arr[$key] = $value;
    141: }
    142:
    143: return $arr;
    144: }
    145:
    146: /**
    147: * Request host
    148: * @return String $host
    149: */
    150: function Host() {
    151: return (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']))
    152: ? $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']
    153: : Env\cli_domain();
    154: }
    155:
    156: /**
    157: * Media types (also known as MIME types)
    158: * @param String $name
    159: * @return Mixed false|String $value|Array $media
    160: */
    161: function MediaTypes (String $name=NULL) {
    162: $media = [
    163: 'binary' => 'application/octet-stream',
    164: 'css' => 'text/css',
    165: 'csv' => 'text/csv',
    166: 'form' => 'multipart/form-data',
    167: 'html' => 'text/html',
    168: 'javascript' => 'text/javascript',
    169: 'json' => 'application/json',
    170: 'text' => 'text/plain',
    171: 'txt' => 'text/plain',
    172: 'xml' => 'text/xml'
    173: ];
    174:
    175: return (! $name)
    176: ? $media
    177: : ((isset($media[$name]))
    178: ? $media[$name]
    179: : false);
    180: }
    181:
    182: /**
    183: * Request method
    184: * @return String $method
    185: */
    186: function Method() {
    187: return (isset($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'])) ? $_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] : 'GET';
    188: }
    189:
    190: /** Return request parameter value by name
    191: * @param String $name
    192: * @return Mixed $value || false
    193: */
    194: function Param (String $name) {
    195: $data = Data();
    196:
    197: return (is_object($data)
    198: && property_exists($data, 'get')
    199: && in_array($name, array_keys($data->get))
    200: ) ? $data->get[$name] : false;
    201: }
    202:
    203: /**
    204: * Request port
    205: * @return Int $port
    206: */
    207: function Port() {
    208: return (isset($_SERVER['SERVER_PORT']))
    209: ? $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT']
    210: : 80;
    211: }
    212:
    213: /**
    214: * POST data from $_POST, or php://input
    215: * @return Array $arr
    216: */
    217: function Post() {
    218: $post = (sizeof($_POST) > 0) ? $_POST : file_get_contents("php://input");
    219: $req = [
    220: 'raw' => $post,
    221: 'arr' => (is_string($post)) ? json_decode($post) : $post
    222: ];
    223: return (array) $req['arr'];
    224: }
    225:
    226: /**
    227: * Request protocol
    228: * @return String $protocol
    229: */
    230: function Protocol() {
    231: return
    232: ((!empty($_SERVER['HTTPS']) && $_SERVER['HTTPS'] != 'off')
    233: || Port() == 443)
    234: ? "https://"
    235: : ((Env\is_cli()) ? Env\cli_protocol() : "http://");
    236: }
    237:
    238: /**
    239: * Request query string
    240: * @return String $query_string
    241: */
    242: function QueryString() {
    243: return (isset($_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']))
    244: ? $_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']
    245: : false;
    246: }
    247:
    248: /** Request meta-data object
    249: * @return Object $def
    250: */
    251: function Request() {
    252: $env = Attributes();
    253: return [
    254: 'http' => $env,
    255: 'elements' => Env\Param('elements'),
    256: 'method' => Method(),
    257: 'modifier' => Env\Param('modifier'),
    258: 'resource' => Env\Param('resource'),
    259: 'resource_url' => implode(File\ds(), [
    260: $env->offset.$env->query_delim,
    261: $env->resource
    262: ]),
    263: 'url' => $env->relative
    264: ];
    265: }
    266:
    267: /**
    268: * Request uri
    269: * @return String $uri
    270: */
    271: function Uri() {
    272: return (isset($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI']))
    273: ? $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI']
    274: : '';
    275: }
    276:
    277: function get_headers_all() {
    278: if (function_exists('getallheaders')) {
    279: return getallheaders();
    280: }
    281: $pos = [
    282: 'PHP_SELF',
    283: 'SCRIPT_NAME',
    284: 'SCRIPT_FILENAME',
    285: 'PATH_TRANSLATED',
    286: 'DOCUMENT_ROOT',
    287: 'REQUEST_TIME_FLOAT',
    288: 'REQUEST_TIME',
    289: 'REQUEST_METHOD',
    290: 'REQUEST_URI',
    291: 'QUERY_STRING'
    292: ];
    293: $out = [];
    294: foreach($_SERVER as $key=>$value) {
    295: if (substr($key,0,5)=="HTTP_") {
    296: $key=str_replace(" ","-",ucwords(strtolower(str_replace("_"," ",substr($key,5)))));
    297: $out[$key]=$value;
    298: } else {
    299: if (in_array($key, $pos)) {
    300: $out[$key]=$value;
    301: }
    302: }
    303: }
    304: return $out;
    305: }
